Backup the configuration on hpux servers

  1. Login to the server on which the work is being performed.
  2. Copy the pre-upgrade directory from NIM server pgnmsv01
    scp -r pgnmsv01:/prod/images/scripts/Pre_Upgrade /var/tmp/Pre_Upgrade
  3. Execute the saveenv script
    cd /var/tmp/Pre_Upgrade/hpux_upgrade
./save_env.sh
  4. Copy the backed up files to NIM server
    scp -r <directoryname> pgnmsv01:/preupgrade/reports/
  5. Make sure that the Make recovery tape is good.
